creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
I subclassed JAASRealm and in eclipse all is working fine.

When deploying to a standard tomcat instance, the prompt doesn't pop up.

The subclassed Realm otherwise works fine as it 
- runs backgroundProcess() very regularly
- calls findSecurityConstraints() on each relevant GET

Please provide a CRITICAL error message to the logs when the prompt for some reason is not sent

creator: markt@apache.org
text: You are going to need to provide a (as simple as possible) test case that demonstrates that this is an issue in Tomcat and not in the custom Realm.
No response for more than a month so I am going to assume this was a problem in the custom realm.
creator: markt@apache.org
